20110103191634.000|20110103191635.000|CC1|AS YOU ALL KNOW, HE HAS BEEN    
20110103191635.000|20110103191636.000|CC1|HERE BEFORE.                    
20110103191636.000|20110103191639.000|CC1|SO THIS IS KIND OF A COMING     
20110103191639.000|20110103191639.000|CC1|BACK.

20110103192355.000|20110103192357.000|CC1|FIRST SPEAK THE TRUTH, NO MORE  
20110103192357.000|20110103192359.000|CC1|SMOKE AND MIRRORS, NO EMPTY     
20110103192359.000|20110103192401.000|CC1|PROMISES.                       
20110103192401.000|20110103192406.000|CC1|SECOND, NO NEW TAXES UNLESS THE 
20110103192406.000|20110103192412.000|CC1|PEOPLE VOTE FOR THEM.           
20110103192412.000|20110103192413.000|CC1|THIRD, RETURN AS MUCH AS        
20110103192413.000|20110103192417.000|CC1|POSSIBLE TO STATE CITIES AND    
20110103192417.000|20110103192418.000|CC1|COUNTIES AND SCHOOLS CLOSER TO  
20110103192418.000|20110103192423.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE.                     
20110103192423.000|20110103192425.000|CC1|WITH YOUR HELP THAT IS EXACTLY  
20110103192425.000|20110103192427.000|CC1|WHAT I INTEND TO DO.            
20110103192427.000|20110103192429.000|CC1|THE BUDGET A PRISON NEXT WEEK   
20110103192429.000|20110103192431.000|CC1|WILL BE PAINFUL, BUT IT WILL BE 
20110103192431.000|20110103192433.000|CC1|AN HONEST BUDGET.               
20110103192433.000|20110103192435.000|CC1|THE ITEMS OF SPENDING WILL BE   
20110103192435.000|20110103192437.000|CC1|MATCHED WITH AVAILABLE TAX      
20110103192437.000|20110103192438.000|CC1|REVENUES.                       
20110103192438.000|20110103192439.000|CC1|SPECIFIC PROPOSALS WILL BE      
20110103192439.000|20110103192441.000|CC1|OFFERED TO REALIGN KEY FUNCTIONS
20110103192441.000|20110103192442.000|CC1|THAT ARE CURRENTLY SPREAD       
20110103192442.000|20110103192444.000|CC1|BETWEEN STATE AND LOCAL         
20110103192444.000|20110103192447.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT IN WAYS THAT ARE     
20110103192447.000|20110103192450.000|CC1|COMPLEX, CONFUSING, AND         
20110103192450.000|20110103192450.000|CC1|INEFFICIENT.                    
20110103192450.000|20110103192452.000|CC1|MY GOAL IS TO ACHIEVE GREATER   
20110103192452.000|20110103192455.000|CC1|ACCOUNTABILITY AND REDUCE THE   
20110103192455.000|20110103192456.000|CC1|HISTORIC SHIFT IN RESPONSIBILITY
20110103192456.000|20110103192457.000|CC1|BACK AND FORTH FROM ONE LEVEL OF
20110103192457.000|20110103192500.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT TO ANOTHER.          
20110103192500.000|20110103192502.000|CC1|A PLAN REPRESENTS MY BEST       
20110103192502.000|20110103192505.000|CC1|UNDERSTANDING OF OUR REAL       
20110103192505.000|20110103192506.000|CC1|DILEMMAS AND POSSIBILITIES.     
20110103192506.000|20110103192508.000|CC1|IT IS A TOUGH BUDGET FOR TOUGH  
20110103192508.000|20110103192509.000|CC1|TIMES.                          
20110103192509.000|20110103192511.000|CC1|WHEN DEALING WITH A BUDGET GAP  
20110103192511.000|20110103192513.000|CC1|IN THE TENS OF BILLIONS A MUST  
20110103192513.000|20110103192516.000|CC1|POINT OUT THAT THERE IS FAR MORE
20110103192516.000|20110103192518.000|CC1|THAN WASTE AND INEFFICIENCY THAT
20110103192518.000|20110103192521.000|CC1|WE HAVE TO TAKE OUT.            
20110103192521.000|20110103192522.000|CC1|YES, A GOVERNMENT WASTES MONEY. 
20110103192522.000|20110103192524.000|CC1|I WILL BE DOING A LOT ABOUT THAT
20110103192524.000|20110103192526.000|CC1|STARTING THIS WEEK.             
20110103192526.000|20110103192527.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT ALSO PAYS FOR    
20110103192527.000|20110103192530.000|CC1|THINGS THAT MOST PEOPLE WANT TO 
20110103192530.000|20110103192532.000|CC1|READ APPROVED ONLY AFTER ELECTED
20110103192532.000|20110103192536.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVES TO IF FINALLY   
20110103192536.000|20110103192539.000|CC1|VOTE THEM INTO LAW COVERING THE
